entry.name: 1 tick delay copper bulbs
entry.description: Make copper bulb block delay 1 tick like in the snapshot.

entry.name: Backup Enchantments type
entry.description:
Add weaker versions of the four protection enchantments.
These provide extra protection with effects identical to the originals but at only 25% of their original power.

entry.name: Bonemeal Coral fan/block
entry.description: Coral fans and Coral blocks can be bonemeal (only in warm ocean biome) to grow into coral reef

entry.name: Bonemeal Small flowers
entry.description: Small flowers planted on mycelium (except wither rose and torch flower) can be bonemeal to make it spreads around.

entry.name: Trophy banners
entry.description: Add some Ominous banner-like banners as trophy. Obtains via boss drops, Shepherd Villager's gifts (Hero of the Village),...

entry.name: Bundle enchantments
entry.description: Add 2 enchantment for bundle (refill and capacity). If mod installed in client-side, slot indicator will calculate correctly.

entry.name: Better enchanting table
entry.description: Enchanting tables can accept bookshelves placed two blocks away and can see bookshelves through non-solid blocks.

entry.name: Click through wall sign and item frame
entry.description:
Allows right-clicking through signs and item frames (must holding item) if they are placed on chests, barrels, or shulker boxes (container blocks). Behave exactly like normally open container.
Shift to rotate item/edit sign.

entry.name: Day counter
entry.description: Day counter each day passed

entry.name: Deepslate generator
entry.description: Deepslate will replace stone and cobble stone if lava + water below y-level 8

entry.name: Invisible item frame
entry.description: Make item frames invisible by shift + right-clicking a non-dyed glass pane into them. They stay invisible when holding an item, otherwise, they emit particles as indicators.

entry.name: Faster copper block oxidation
entry.description: Copper block and its variations oxidize faster in rain and water.

entry.name: Faster minecart
entry.description: Rail placed on `Gravel` will make Minecart and its variants travel faster.

entry.name: Shulker box label
entry.description: Shulker box will shows its custom name upon placed.

entry.name: Usable empty suspicious sand/gravel
entry.description: You can add items (by shift right-click) into empty suspicious sand and gravel.

entry.name: No xp limit anvil
entry.description: Removes the "Too Expensive" limitation from anvils. In Client side will still displays the "Too expensive" label, but still functional. This issue will be fixed if mod also installed in Client-side

entry.name: No farmland trampling
entry.description: Farmland is not trampled if the entity (including players) is wearing Feather Falling boots or has the Slow Falling effect.

entry.name: XP from crops
entry.description: Gain xp from harvesting crops.

entry.name: Sleep without set respawn point
entry.description: Sneak and right-click a bed to sleep without changing your respawn point.

entry.name: Torch lights target on fire
entry.description: If any entity holding torch while holding a torch, soul torch; target will be set on fire.

entry.name: Weather not skipped by sleeping
entry.description:
Sleeping doesn't clear weather.
RAIN_ONLY will keep rain only.
ALL_WEATHER will keep rain and thunder (this mode will prevent you from sleeping while thundering)

entry.name: Washing filled maps
entry.description: Clean filled maps using cauldron.

entry.name: Sneaking sweet berry
entry.description: Sneaking through sweet berry bushes.

entry.name: Pants protect from sweet berry
entry.description: Wearing pants protects you from sweet berry bush damage.

entry.name: Faster glass/glowstone mining
entry.description: Pickaxes mine glass-related blocks and glowstone faster.

entry.name: 4 element painting
entry.description: 4 Element 2x2 paintings can now be placed in survival mode.

entry.name: Wet sponge dries in warm biomes
entry.description: Wet sponge placed in warm biome will eventually dry out

entry.name: Bundle can place block
entry.description:
Switch to place mode by holding bundle and shift-leftclick to the ground.
Then you can place block that inside the bundle.

entry.name: Hoe can harvest multiple crops
entry.description: Hoe can harvest multiple crops. Default is 3x3, diamond and netherite gives 5x5.

entry.name: Mace can rotate blocks
entry.description: Use mace (sneaking + right-click) to rotate directional blocks if possible.

entry.name: Shear defuses TNT
entry.description: Shears can be used on primed TNT to give a chance to defuse it.

entry.name: Shear pickpocket Villager
entry.description:
Pickpocket villager using `Shear` while `sneaking`.
Attempting to pickpocket from the front has a high chance of making them angry; reduce this risk by pickpocketing from behind, or completely nullify it with an invisibility potion.
 Pickpocketing a villager has a chance to reset their profession.
 The higher the profession level, the lower the chance of it resetting.

entry.name: Shear prevents plants grow
entry.description: Shear can be used on `Saplings`, `Bamboo`, `Vine` and `Sugar cane` to prevent it from growing.

entry.name: Spyglass "What is that?"
entry.description: See additional block/entity information (noteblock, trailspawner cooldown, redstone power, xp stored inside furnace,...) with a Spyglass, default radius is 5 blocks, zoom with Spyglass will extend to 32 blocks

entry.name: Slime chunk detector
entry.description: Holding a `Slime Ball`, `Slime Block`, or items with the `diversity:slime_detector` tag will emit particles and sound when in a slime chunk, with a 10% chance while walking/running and 70% chance when sneaking.

entry.name: Trident can call thunderstorm
entry.description:
If standing at max y-level and throw a channeling trident (with >50% durability) up to the sky
 Thunder storm will be summoned, in return trident will lose channeling and all of durability (will not break)

entry.name: Clock shows time
entry.description: Use the clock to show the current world's time.

entry.name: Clock check Villager schedule
entry.description: Check villager work schedule by holding Clock in hand and right-click any type of workstation block.

entry.name: Waxed blocks detector
entry.description: Waxed copper blocks will emit particles if holding a spyglass while sneaking.

entry.name: 9 lives cat
entry.description: Cat has 9 lives

entry.name: Silent nametag
entry.description: Nametag contains 'silent' 'shutup' will make mobs silent

entry.name: Baby nametag
entry.description: Nametag contains 'baby' will force baby animals never grow up

entry.name: Brushable parrot/chicken
entry.description: Brushing parrots or chickens will drop feathers.

entry.name: Explosive sniffer
entry.description:
Right-click powder (gun powder, blaze powder, sugar, redstone, glowstone dust) to Sniffer will make it sniffs and...
"To teach kids never to sniff something unknown."
- Faewulf

entry.name: Goat drops wool and mutton
entry.description: Goat drops wool and mutton when killed.

entry.name: Sniffer on moss block
entry.description: Sniffer will drops spores blossom/Small dripleaf when sniffed on moss blocks.

entry.name: Pat your pet
entry.description: Interact with your pets via shift + right-click (wolf, cat, horse, parrot) to pat them.

entry.name: Fox bury items
entry.description: Foxes can bury items in sand or gravel.

entry.name: Smaller bees
entry.description: Bees are now half their default size.

entry.name: Random size fish/squid
entry.description: Fish and squid now come in random sizes.

entry.name: Piglin and golden trimmed armor
entry.description: Piglins treat golden trimmed armor as golden armor.

entry.name: Tamed horse/donkey/mule no wandering
entry.description: Tamed animals wearing saddles won't move around.

entry.name: Horse/mule/donkey in boats
entry.description: Horses, donkeys, and mules can fit in boats!

entry.name: Egg on haybale auto hatch after despawn
entry.description: Chicken eggs on haybale will try to hatch after it despawned.

entry.name: Rabbit can breed after eat carrot crops.
Wandering trader announcer
entry.description: Send a message to player when wandering trader appears.

entry.name: /emote
entry.description: Perform sound like meow, purr, purroew, and woof in chat

entry.name: Hydrophobic elytra
entry.description: Elytra can't be use in rain, or in water.

entry.name: End stone is cheese
entry.description: you can eat end stone :)

entry.name: Reverse phantom spawn condition
entry.description: Phantom will spawn if the player continuously sleeps skipping the night.
